entry.title: check out my new crib
entry.content:
I’ve had this domain for awhile, but haven’t had the time to build a website the way I like. I wanted a blog that accepted markdown as text input, as well as some other social-media integration features, so imagine how intrigued I was to find Octopress which supported exactly this. And since it’s basically just a rack app, it should be pretty easy for me to change it if I want to.

More to come.
